name: Posher
body:
## Posher Features

- inline listing edits
- 1 click sharing
- in-page search filtering

## Installation Instructions

...

---

## Release Notes

### Posher 0.5

- Edit icon (pencil) replaces comment icon on owned listings
  - Opens in-place modal (iframe) for editing, and updates tile when complete
- Reordered edit page to place title and description section first
- Update button added to edit page/modal header
- Realtime in-page filtering using search text (filter icon next to search icon, toggles)
  - Support for "quotes" for exact matches
  - Support for ` or ` for multiple matches
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
